title: There's No Remorse Like the Remorse of Chess

Fabiano Caruana vs Wesley So
Norway Chess (2019) (Armageddon), Stavanger NOR, rd 4, Jun-08 
Russian Game: Nimzowitsch Attack (C42)

1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nf6 3. Ne5 d6 4. Nf3 Ne4 5. Nc3 Nc3 6. dc3 Be7 7. Be3 Nc6 8. Qd2 Be6 9. O-O-O Qd7 10. h4 h6 11. Nd4 Nd4 12. Bd4 Rg8 13. c4 c5 14. Bc3 O-O-O 15. Qe3 g5 16. hg5 hg5 17. Be2 Rge8 18. b3 d5 19. cd5 Bd5 20. Bf3 Bd6 21. Qg5 Bf3 22. gf3 Qe6 23. Kb1 Be7 24. Qf4 Bd6 25. Qa4 Bb8 26. Rdg1 Qd7 27. Qc4 Qd5 28. Qg4 f5 29. Qh5 Rg8 30. Re1 Bf4 31. Bf6 Rd7 32. Kb2 b6 33. Re8 Re8 34. Qe8 Kb7 35. Rh8 Ka6 36. Qe2 Kb7 37. a4 Qd6 38. Bc3 Re7 39. Qc4 Be5 40. Rf8 Bc3 41. Qc3 Qd5 42. f4 Ka6 43. a5 ba5 44. Rf6 Kb5 45. Ka3 Re4 46. Qh3 Qd1 47. Qc3 a4 48. Rf5 Qc1 49. Qb2 Qb2 50. Kb2 ab3 51. Kb3 Rb4 52. Kc3 Rc4 53. Kd3 Rd4 54. Ke3 Rc4 55. Kd2 Rd4 56. Ke2 Re4 57. Kd2 Rd4 58. Kc1 a5 59. Rf8 Re4 60. f5 Re1 61. Kb2 Rf1 62. Rb8 Kc6 63. Rf8 Rf2 64. f6 a4 65. Ka3 Kb7 66. c4 Rf4 67. f7 Ka7 68. Ka4 Rc4 69. Kb5 Rf4 70. Kc5 Kb7 71. Kd6 Rf1

The 7th edition of Altibox Norway Chess is a 10-player round-robin featuring World Champion Magnus Carlsen and six more of the world's Top 10 players. It takes place from 3-15 June in the Clarion Energy Hotel and Stavanger Concert Hall in Stavanger. Classical games are worth 2 points for a win, but in case of a draw players get half a point and play an Armageddon game for the remaining point.

Players receive 2 hours for each classical game, with a 10-second increment only after move 40. No draw offers are allowed until move 30. In the Armageddon game White has 10 minutes to Black's 7, with a 3-second increment from move 61. In case of a draw the player with Black gets the full point. If there's a tie for first at the end of the tournament a 3+2 blitz playoff will take place. Official website: norwaychess.no

To those of you who read the description: You are an excellent subscriber! :)
